00030 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
00031 #import "WebActionController.h"
00032 #import "WebActionView.h"
00033 #import "WebLayoutView.h"
00034 
00040 @interface WebActiveController : NSObject <WebActionController> {
00041  WebActionView* view;
00042  WebLayoutView* layout;
00043  NSString* flash;
00044 }
00045 @property (nonatomic, retain) WebActionView* view;
00046 @property (nonatomic, retain) WebLayoutView* layout;
00047 
00054 @property (nonatomic, retain) NSString* flash;
00055 
00062 - (NSString*)modelClassName;
00063 
00064 /*
00065  Subclasses should implement the following methods to support pre action setup (See WebActionController)
00066  - (void)init<ActionName>Action:(WebRequest*)request;
00067  
00068  Then for each action
00069  - (id)<actionName>Action:(WebRequest*)request;
00070  
00071  The return value can be on of three options.
00072  A. KVO accessable dictionary for access by view templates. (ie {{ data.key.path }} )
00073  B. NSString for direct rendering as a html output.
00074  C. WebResponse setup with output data/body content.
00075  
00076  Other optional methods
00077  - (SEL)selectorForActionName:(NSString*)name;
00078  Details: Dynamically replace action names with new selector
00079  
00080  - (void)preProcessRequest:(WebRequest*)request;
00081  - (void)postProcessResponse:(WebResponse*)response fromRequest:(WebRequest*)request
00082  - (id)defualtAction:(WebRequest*)request;
00083  */
00084 
00086 - (id)index:(WebRequest*)wr;
00087 
00089 - (id)object:(WebRequest*)wr;
00090 
00092 - (id)create:(WebRequest*)wr;
00093 
00095 - (id)update:(WebRequest*)wr;
00096 
00098 - (id)delete:(WebRequest*)wr;
00099 
00100 @end
